sentences.en: an idea that is acceptable in principle.
sentences.cn: 大体可以接受的想法

sentences.en: As is stated above, this principle applies to all cases.
sentences.cn: 如前文所讲, 这一原则适合所有案例.

sentences.en: Each side declared that it would never abandon its principle.
sentences.cn: 各方都说绝不放弃自己的原则.

sentences.en: Haig went on to elucidate his personal principle of war.
sentences.cn: 海格继续解释他个人的战争原则。

sentences.en: He called for a return to first principles (= the most important ideas ) of road safety for children.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁回归儿童道路安全的根本原则。

sentences.en: He refused on principle to agree to the terms of the treaty.
sentences.cn: 根据自己的道德观念,他拒绝同意条约上的条款.

sentences.en: He would vote against it on principle.
sentences.cn: 他会根据原则投反对票。

sentences.en: He’s got no principles at all!
sentences.cn: 他毫无道德准则！

sentences.en: Homeopathic treatment is based on the "like cures like" principle.
sentences.cn: 顺势疗法是基于“以毒攻毒”的原理。

sentences.en: It’s against my principles to accept gifts from clients.
sentences.cn: 收受客户礼物违背我的原则。

sentences.en: Nuclear weapons seem to violate the just war principle of proportionality.
sentences.cn: 核武器似乎违背了正义战争的罚当其罪原则。

sentences.en: One must not be vague on matters of principle.
sentences.cn: 在原则问题上不能含糊.

sentences.en: Respect for life is a cardinal principle of English law.
sentences.cn: 尊重生命是英国法律最重要的原则。

sentences.en: Schools try to teach children a set of principles.
sentences.cn: 学校设法教给孩子们一套道德准则。

sentences.en: Similar principles apply in the case of older children (= the principles are the same as others that have been mentioned ) .
sentences.cn: 类似的原则也适用于年纪大些的儿童。

sentences.en: Taxation is not popular in principle, merely acceptable in context.
sentences.cn: 征税基本上是不受欢迎的，在一定情境中才勉强为人接受。

sentences.en: the basic principles of business management
sentences.cn: 商务管理的基本原则

sentences.en: The general principle is that education should be available to all children up to the age of 16.
sentences.cn: 总的原则是，16 岁以下儿童都应该能接受教育。

sentences.en: The principle had been pernicious from beginning to end.
sentences.cn: 这条原则自始至终都是有害的.

sentences.en: The Treasury was opposed in principle to the proposals.
sentences.cn: 财政部原则上反对这些提案.

sentences.en: They are agreed in principle but not in detail.
sentences.cn: 他们的看法在大体上是一致的,但是在细节上有所不同.

sentences.en: Under no circumstances can we agree to such a principle.
sentences.cn: 在任何情况下我们都不能同意这一原则.

sentences.en: You must state your position on matters of principle . Don't be equivocal.
sentences.cn: 在原则问题上要表明你的态度,不要依违两可.

phrases.tran_cn: 第一原则；第一原理；基本原则
一般原则；一般原理；普遍原理
基本上：与基本原则有关地
按原则地：根据或因为行为准则
n. 反应原理，反作用原理；反酌原理

trans.tran_cn: 道德原则，法则，观念，理由，定律
trans.tran_en: a moral rule or belief about what is right and wrong, that influences how you behave
